name: Ordinary Day - GMTK 2020
description:
This is an ordinary day, a game where everything has it's own will and cannot be controlled, and you just have to try and avoid everything. 

NOTE: The to-do paper on the bottom left is broken, it is supposed to say, in order:

Turn on the lawnmower, water the flowers, let out the dogs, prune the bush, put out the garbage bin, turn on the rc car and lastly, Done, you can go.

This is my 4th game jam, but my first 48-hour one.

Every asset except for some sound effects are made by me.

Other ones are:

https://freesound.org/people/deleted_user_364925/sounds/47252/

https://freesound.org/people/blosche/sounds/387434/

https://freesound.org/people/passAirmangrace/sounds/340905/
